executable.title: Initialized Control Points (BRAINS)
executable.description: Outputs bspline control points as landmarks
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the National Alliance for Medical Image Computing (NAMIC), funded by the National Institutes of Health through the NIH Roadmap for Medical Research, Grant U54 EB005149. Additional support for Mark Scully and Hans Johnson at the University of Iowa.

integer-vector.name: splineGridSize
integer-vector.label: Number Of Grid Subdivisions
integer-vector.description: The number of subdivisions of the BSpline Grid to be centered on the image space. Each dimension must have at least 3 subdivisions for the BSpline to be correctly computed.

integer-vector.name: permuteOrder
integer-vector.label: permuteOrder
integer-vector.description: The permutation order for the images. The default is 0,1,2 (i.e. no permutation)

integer.name: numberOfThreads
integer.label: Number Of Threads
integer.description: Explicitly specify the maximum number of threads to use.
